name: Antimycobacterials
title: Antimycobacterials
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values includes select antibiotics that are antimycobacterial.  Including oral and IV formulations.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who are on antimycobacterial  antibiotics),(Inclusion Criteria: Only use codes that represent antimycobacterial  antibiotics  and any that has the ingredients as Antimycobacterials: bedaquiline, capreomycin, cycloserine, dapsone, ethambutol, isoniazid, pretomanid, pyrazinamide, rifabutin, rifampin, rifapentine, streptomycin.),(Exclusion Criteria: Otic, Topical and Ophthalmic formulation)
